'''''Mallorn'' 4''' is the fourth issue of the [[Tolkien Society]]'s journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in 1971.

==Contents==

* '''Editorial'''
** The Editors' Thing
*** By Steven Thomson
** Letters to the Editors
*** By John B. Abbott, Arthur Crittenden, Su Adler & Helen Kurley, Dave Weldrake, Hal Broome, Bryan Talbot, and A.R. Fallone
** Competition announcement
*** Task: to prepare a cast list for a hypothetical film adaptation of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
*** Note: The results of this competition were never announced in subsequent issues.
** Belladonna's Postbag
*** By Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]]), Malcom Edwards, Dave Weldrake, Jane Keep, Vincent Curran, Cliff Cumming, Hal Broome, Neil L. Burgess, and Hartley Patterson
* '''Notes'''
** Tolkien and the Fairies of British Folk Tradition
*** By Dave Weldrake
** Notes on the Influence of Anglo-Saxon Literature on ''The Lord of the Rings''
*** By Bob Borsley
** Social, Military, and Political Aspects of Rohan
*** By Peter Burley
* '''Creative'''
** Ghost of Love (poem)
*** By A.R. Fallone
* '''Book reviews'''
** ''Lud-in-the-Mist'' by Hope Mirrlees
*** Reviewed by Hal Broome
** ''Deryni Rising'' by Katherine Kurtz
*** Reviewed by A.R. Fallone
** The Elric novels by Michael Moorcock
*** Reviewed by Rosie Turner
** ''The Wood Beyond the World'' by [[William Morris]]
*** Reviewed by Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]])
* '''Illustrations'''
** By Bryan Talbot, John B. Abbott, Roger Nixon, and Hal Broome
